SourceBufferAppendWindowEnd.summary:
The appendWindowEnd property of the
interface controls the timestamp for the end of the append window, a
timestamp range that can be used to filter what media data is appended to the
SourceBuffer. Coded media frames with timestamps within this range will be
appended, whereas those outside the range will be filtered out.

remarks.para: The default value of appendWindowEnd is positive infinity.

SourceBufferAppendWindowEnd.value: A double, indicating the end time of the append window, in seconds.
